fields.Title of Presentation: Data Rocks: How Harmonizing Your Files and Folders Can Improve Your Life
fields.Description/Abstract:
Is your computer desktop or shared drive or Google Drive a mess of folders and files? Do you get frustrated when you try to remember where that program assessment data from three summers ago lives now? Is your administration asking for aggregated instruction statistics for courses taught by librarians no longer at your institution? 
Managing files in a proactive manner can save you from headaches and disaster, both professionally and personally. This session will help interested librarians with file naming, structure and organization, documentation, and appropriate sharing and preservation options.
